Package game.graphics

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.graphics.Renderer
  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The renderer is concerned with loading images necessary for the game and providing methods to render these on the screen
    Author:
    Andreea
